description: Sasha Petraske’s ginger ale base at Drinkshop calls for lime juice instead of lemon It is an ingredient in the slyly named Presbyterian, which includes bourbon or rum blended with ale and club soda, and topped with a twist of lemon.
title: Ginger Ale Recipe
text:
Sasha Petraske’s ginger ale base at Drinkshop calls for lime juice instead of lemon. It is an ingredient in the slyly named Presbyterian, which includes bourbon or rum blended with ale and club soda, and topped with a twist of lemon.
Featured in: Ginger Ale Without The Can.
